SERVER_CREATION_INVALID.head: Error with server creation!
SERVER_CREATION_INVALID.body: The software or node could have been removed by an admin before deploying your server. Please create another server, the resources has been refunded!

SERVER_CREATION_ERROR.head: Error with server creation!
SERVER_CREATION_ERROR.body: An error has occured while creating your server, your resources has been refunded. Please try creating another server.

SERVER_CREATION_SUCCESS.head: Server has been deployed.
SERVER_CREATION_SUCCESS.body: Time to enjoy, your server has been deployed successfully with the defined configurations.
